src:
Динамо Загреб – Шахтер: прогноз букмекеров на матч

02 Nov 2019, 20:32

Букмекеры дали прогноз на матч между Динамо Загреб – Шахтер, которые сыграют в четвертом туре группового раунда Лиги чемпионов.
Динамо Загреб и Шахтер в среду, 6 октября, сыграют в рамках четвертого тура группового раунда Лиги чемпионов. На этот раз в гости поедут горняки.
По мнению букмекеров, на стадионе Максимир фаворитами матча являются подопечные Ненада Белица. На победу Динамо Загреб принимают ставки с коэффициентом 2.24. Успех Шахтера оценивается в 3.15. Ничейный результат встречи – 3.45.
Читайте: Динамо в добавленное время обыграло Шахтер в Кубке Украины
Матч начнется в 22.00. За прямой трансляцией игры можно будет следить на сайте Факты ICTV.
Как сообщалось, в третьем туре группового этапа ЛЧ Шахтер и Динамо Загреб сыграли вничью.
text:
German shepherd mix with disc problem
Shepherd dog mix Balou needs a new home - otherwise he will be euthanized

02 Nov 2019, 20:10


Balou has a health problem, needs surgery and then receives intensive care. But the shelter lacks the capacity to do so.

Wiesbaden - Balou is a German shepherd mix with disc problem. What he needs now is a new home. Because - and that is worrisome - otherwise he will be euthanized.
The whole story begins three years ago. The Animal Welfare Association Wiesbaden takes over Balou from another animal welfare association. In 2018, Balou suddenly starts to limp - a herniated disc that needs surgery. Afterwards Balou needs intensive care.
Wiesbaden: Dog from the shelter is looking for a new home


Balou needs a new home - otherwise he will be euthanized © Jennifer Lütters / Wiesbaden shelter

At the Wiesbaden shelter, the impossible is made true: Balou goes out on a regular basis, his trainer and the dog carers ensure that Balou moves frequently. Because movement is important for a dog with a herniated disc and Balou can even romp around with other dogs in the field. But recently the shock: Balou limps again and must be operated on as soon as possible again. The operation itself is not the problem at all, explains the shelter on the homepage, much more is the six-month care after the shelter simply not to stemmen.Das shelter now sees two options, either he is euthanized or - and that is for all the best option - Balou finds a new home, preferably as soon as possible. But that is not so easy, because Balou must be cared for intensively in the months after the operation
These are the requirements for a foster home:

House or apartment without stairs, ideally a meadow on the doorstep
no small children or animals in the household
Dog experience or experience with territorial dogs
Willingness to provide intensive care for Balou during the OP phase and rehabilitation period

If you can imagine hosting and taking care of Balou, please contact the animal shelter in Wiesbaden at 0611/74516.
Time is playing against Balou, who despite his small handicap is a funny and happy dog. The cost of the surgery and the aftercare takes over the animal protection association completely.

by Valentin Beige

Every year at the Tierheim Frankfurt-Fechenheim all seats are taken during the summer holidays. And a woman left her dog alone in the car in midsummer in Wiesbaden, she was only a short shopping, but the dog was then in mortal danger.
